items.title: Eko DisCo registers electricity company as Lagos subsidiary
items.summary: Eko Electricity Distribution Company Plc (EKEDC) has formally registered Excel Electricity Distribution Company Limited as a wholly owned subsidiary to oversee its electricity distribution operations within Lagos State.

items.title: NSE: With 55% Grid Access, Nigeria Faces Persistent Energy Challenges
items.summary: Despite Nigeria's installed capacity of 13,014 MW serving over 220 million people, only 55 per cent of Nigerians has grid access, highlighting persistent energy challenges in the country.
